name: @oni93/vue-searchable-select
description: ``` <vue-searchable-component     :newTag="false"     :options="suppliers.map(function (supplier) {                     return {                         text: supplier.name,                         id: supplier.id                     }                 })"     :placeholder="'Select Supplier'"     @input="(data)=>{this.product_form.suppier_id = data.id ?? null}"> </vue-searchable-component> ```
